Mortuary has system to provide identification tag/wrist band for each stored dead body
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Identification tag should be of plastic water proof type and carry information on full name,address,age,sex, registration number, date and time of death and when body kept for storage

checkpoint.name: All bodies sent to mortuary is accompanied with copy of death certificate issued by hospital
Mortuary/Hospital has standard label fixed to winding cloth over upper part of body
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: The upper part of the body is taken out of mortuary cold storage room i.e. head for identification

checkpoint.name: Mortuary technician to maintain full records of body brought to mortuary
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check Mortuary register which contain details: Identification number, Name, Sex, age of deceased, date and time of death, identification mark of deceased and finger impression, details of near relative, weather autopsy is done or not, if done then date and time of autopsy, name of autopsy surgeon, date and time when body is placed in cold storage, length of body and breadth across should, list of valuables which have been removed from body, signature of technician, date and time of when body is removed & Name of relative/police collecting body.

checkpoint.name: Mortuary has system for categorize the dead bodies before preservation.
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Main categorization in Non medico legal and medico legal which is further divided into Identified and Unknown

checkpoint.name: Cold storage room has system to maintain temperature of cabinets
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Temperature should not be allowed to fall below 0oC for short duration preservation while to preserve the body for long time it must be deep frozen so -20oC temp must be kept for one compartment

checkpoint.name: Mortuary has system for preparation of body before cold storage
Each cold storage door has holder for identification ticket
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check identification ticket is available on storage cabin containing dead body

checkpoint.name: Death Certificate and label is marked MLC in bold if medico legal cases
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check death certificate /dead body.

checkpoint.name: Name of deceased is written on board on wall of the room which list each cold storage compartment
Hospital has system to intimate mortuary staff before sending body to mortuary
Mortuary has system for disposal of unclaimed bodies as per state guideline
Mortuary has system for storage of unclaimed body for fixed duration as per state guideline

Staff is aware of conditions in which blood transfusion is not done/repeated
checkpoint.meansOfVerification:
(1) Blood transfusion should not be started until the child has begun to gain weight.(2) Following the transfusion, if the Hb remains
less than 4 g/dl or between 4 and 6 g/dl with continuing respiratory
distress, DO NOT repeat the transfusion within 4 days

Blood transfusion of SAM child is done as per standard Guideline
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Blood transfusion is required (1) Hb is less than 4 g/dl (2) or if there is respiratory distress and Hb is between 4 and 6 g/dl.

checkpoint.name: Blood transfusion is monitored and regulated by qualified person
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Give (1) whole blood 10 ml/kg body weight slowly over 3 hours (2) furosemide 1 mg/kg IV at the start of the transfusion
